How it Works

At Psychic Source you control how much you spend, and you're only charged for the time you talk with an advisor. No hidden fees. No surprise charges.

Questions?

Call 1.800.965.3049 to reach our Customer Care Representatives. Our Customer Care Center is not outsourced or overseas, and is there to help you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. You can also chat online with one of our friendly Customer Care representatives.

Safety and security at Psychic Source

Psychic Source is committed to protecting your privacy and uses some of the most sophisticated security software commercially available. We respect your privacy and are committed to no spam. Your information is safe with us.
